text: @GovRonDeSantis 50,000? But wait, the beaches are open and now your allowing restaurants to open up at a cap. Are you doing so for Florida numbers to go up?  Your approach on COVID19 is full of delusion, and also using "for this batch," like its sole kind of cooking show. OOF.
